document.full_text: after talks in paris, ministers passed the problem of how to help the libyan opposition to the united nations, urging an undefined increase of pressure on the libyan leader, col. muammar el-qaddafi.
document.title: g-8 ministers fail to agree on libya no-flight zone
lines_and_colors: after talks in paris, ministers passed the problem of how to help the libyan opposition to the united nations, urging an undefined increase of pressure on the libyan leader, col. muammar el-qaddafi.
